website_summaries.verdict: The awkwardly large inline remote keeps the BackBeat Fit 300 from being an ideal running headphone, but there's still a lot to like about them.
pros: The affordable Plantronics BackBeat Fit is a lightweight, sweatproof Bluetooth headphone designed for gym and everyday use that sounds good and fits comfortably
A nice carrying pouch is included
cons: Inline remote is large and little clunky
Because of the design of the remote, this headphone isn't ideal for running

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately not a good option for me
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the weight of the control mechanism pulling on the right side continuously pulls the ear bud out of my right ear. I have changed the ear piece size, but have not been able to undergo a workout with out having to constantly re-adjust and re-insert the right ear bud.
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity

customer_reviews.title: Best sport headphones for women
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these for 9 months, still love them. The clip broke after 1 month (it was flimsy). They still work great and stay in my ears during my daily commute and during running. It has multiple sizinf included but the smallest is perfect for a lady. A lotnof headphones are sized for guys and I my ear gets sore... there are amazing, I practically sleep in them. UPDATE: it’s been a year, I just love these headphones. They are very lightweight but good at isolating sound. They are so comfortable I can wear for hours without ear fatigue. My only peeve is the battery life. For long hauls battery life is about 4-5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought a more expensive pair of name brand headphones for running that wound up being cheap and flimsy, and lost connection from across the room. I have used these almost every day for the past month and so far no problems, clear sound and a very durable cord. It does have some memory though so I wouldn't pull on it a lot, but the material feels like it will last a while. Ear pieces fit nice and come with three sizes that hold well and are comfortable, controls are easily learned and not overly complicated, even if the battery/control piece is a little larger than most others. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C

customer_reviews.title: sweatproof but mic not as great as others
customer_reviews.text: These are working great for me - definitely sweat proof - gardening in 90 degree heat and able to take a call - clip broke very quickly and the mic does not work well for voice to text at all - and sometimes people can't hear me clearly so wonder about the mic - but overall working well and as advertised
customer_reviews.author: L Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Volume too low for the gym (gym blasts terrible music)
customer_reviews.text: Would not stay in ears. I tried all 3 ear gels. Volume too low for the gym (gym blasts terrible music)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Died in one ear
customer_reviews.text: I am not satisfied with these headphones and unfornately i can't recommend to anybody. I had purchased my pair in april this year and this week died in one ear (the control side), it's very sad because I tried to find a headphones adecuate for running, this is my principal motivation for use headphones. I don't know if there is warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Javier Murillo Sánchez

customer_reviews.title: It pairs fast and battery life is great.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great device. Battery life and quality of sound. This is my replacement set. My first set was destroyed by my dog. I was so devastated that I had to get another one. Oh it connects really fast to device.
customer_reviews.author: mecheduchice

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but only worked for 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved these for workouts. I am notoriously hard on headphones and they just died today after about 9 months of use. Clip broke a few months ago, but didn’t really mind. Lately had also notice a decline in battery life. Will consider if any other pair of these is worth it, since they are relatively good value.
customer_reviews.author: BOS 2003

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally washed my first pair of these, much to my delight discovered that the washer trip did not affect the quality of the headphones. While I wouldn't recommend it, I was pleased that they still worked afterwards. Love these enough that I bought a second pair (one to use at the office, one for home/gym, without having to worry about leaving them on the charger at one place or the other).
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability, great sound while it lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this product for a little over four (4) months. Bottom line is don't buy this product if you are active and plan to move around a lot. The sound quality is great, the battery easily lasts for 6 hours of podcast listening, but the right ear bud has developed a short, dropping all sound, where the cable connects into the earpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Omega

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great battery life.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Bluetooth headphones I have used yet. Pair easily and great battery life. Worth the price and have held up to everything I have put them through.
customer_reviews.author: Meredyth A Melcher

customer_reviews.title: perfect for running
customer_reviews.text: good product for the price. 6-hour battery life as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: got it as a birthday gift. the sound is great, the distance is amazing and overall its pretty great! the only thing is the fitting into the ear is a bit funky
customer_reviews.author: Eugene S.

customer_reviews.title: Dope bass
customer_reviews.text: The sound is grate and even sound better when the song has good bass but the only downside is when making call it sound cut in and out
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sweat proof ear buds for my husband. He is a truck driver and is in and out of the truck and is always breaking a sweat. He absoulty loves these. He had some prior to these and I would hate when he called me because I could hear every back round sound except is voice clearly. Good buy. And even better on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Norma majeau

customer_reviews.title: They were fine for about a month
customer_reviews.text: They were fine for about a month. Then the right side stopped working. They look sturdy but they aren’t.
customer_reviews.author: John L Ringo

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT DESERVE THIS HIGH PRICE
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DO NOT BUY IT. It literally doesn’t deserve this price and This product is not comfortable for ears and even for working out. It even comes with no box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and excellent noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Light, precise, superb sound quality, and excellent noise cancelling. The best I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Work great. The transmitter can be a little heavy but i got used to it very quickly and forgot all about it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Bought this product and LOVED IT! But then 4 month after having the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product and LOVED IT! But then 4 month after having the product it completely died on me. So disappointed. I want a refund
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Kenow

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: Most secure fit I've found in sports ear buds, didn't immediately fizzle out like other "sweatproof" sets.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Oak

customer_reviews.title: This headphone is plagued with microphonics (when the headphone cable ...
customer_reviews.text: This headphone is plagued with microphonics (when the headphone cable transforms mechanical vibrations - such as when it rubs against your shirt collar - into loud undesired noise).
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good sports headphones
customer_reviews.text: This headphones have good sound and a reliable battery life. I'm happy with them keeping in mind the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Bluetooth ear phones
customer_reviews.text: I think they really sound good battery life is OK they’re really comfortable and they stay in my ears better than most others. I actually found this pair one day while I was waking. I took them home cleaned them up and they powered right up I’ve been Using them ever since. Make sure they’re clipped to your shirt or you can lose them very easily. I believe that is the reason I found mine.
customer_reviews.author: robert e hatton

customer_reviews.title: There are many better earbuds at better price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at Fry's when it was on sale for $30. It sounded so weak, I returned right away. There are many better earbuds at better price. Even this earbud which I bought at $11 sounds a way better.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is great and fits good in your ears
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great and fits good in your ears. I dislike the Bluetooth setup and having to disconnect them to make phone calls, but other than that no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Jaybird X3's
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bluetooth earbuds I have had. I had the Jaybird x3's but they just didn't have much bass. These earbuds have excellent sound quality and bass and in my opinion are much better than the Jaybird's. These earbuds are also very lightweight and look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jugdeep Singh

customer_reviews.title: Fail!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work right out of the box. Sent them back for refund, junk.
customer_reviews.author: Luis C.

customer_reviews.title: These are the best wireless headphones I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wireless headphones I have ever used! Bluetooth connects perfectly, and the shirt clip prevents the cords from bouncing around. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Abagail Roy

product_meta.title: Plantronics BackBeat FIT 300 Sweatproof Sport Earbuds, Wireless Headphones, Dark Blue/Blue
product_meta.description: Color:BlueFrom brunch to yoga class, coffee dates to gym sessions, you’re always on the move — and your music needs to keep up. Just like you, our sleek and discreet BackBeat FIT 300 series of wireless sport earbuds were designed to do it all, offering big sound in a small, portable package. Their stable, ultra-light fit holds up during workouts, while their sweatproof coating protects against rain and sweat. And the unique patent-pending, secure-fit eartips block out noise for an immersive listening experience from one destination to the next. BackBeat FIT 300 Series — made for life in motion.
feature_bullets: STABILITY: Patent-pending eartip design and 2-in-1 cable clip provide stability for your wireless earbuds during sport and fitness use
COMFORT: Ultra-lightweight design and unique patent-pending secure-fit eartips minimize pressure points and provide all-day comfort
SWEAT AND MOISTURE PROTECTION: Sweatproof P2i coating and IPx5-rated water-resistance protect the earphones from sweat, rain and spills

NOISE-CANCELLING: 6 mm drivers and occlusive eartip design blocks out noise and delivers deep, rich sound; whether you’re in the gym or out running errands, these noise-cancelling headphones will suit your life on the go
LONG LASTING BATTERY: Rechargeable battery lets you listen wirelessly with up to six hours of power on a single charge and a full hour of listening from a 15-minute quick charge

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars49 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
